about_the_game:
🎵My style is ridiculous🎵

Toilet World is a short horror game themed around Skibidi Toilet, a popular series of humorous and absurd animated short films on YouTube, known for its humorous and absurd style, as well as its catchy music that has garnered many fans. This time, let's experience the fun of entering the world of Skibidi Toilet ourselves!

🎵Brrr, skibidi, dom-dom-dom, yes-yes Skibidi-dabudu, nib-nib🎵

  • Explore Unique Toilet Worlds: There's treasure hidden in the toilets! Each room presents a new, whimsical world with distinct themes and surprises.

  • Music and Sound: Enjoy the iconic Skibidi music and sound effects that add to the game's charm and hilarity. The audio experience will keep you entertained and engaged.

  • Interactive Elements: Interact with interesting objects and characters within the game. Explore and enjoy, as anything can happen in the Toilet World!

🎵Skibidi, dom-dom-dom, yes-yes🎵

Join us and dive into the wacky and wild Toilet World! Ready to flush away boredom? This game is your answer!

This game is created by @Colorfulgame with YAHAHA Horror Game Kit and YAHAHA assists the creator with packaging and publishing the game based on their request. Yahaha Horror Gamekit is tailored for imaginative creators and players who adore horror games, all without the need for any programming expertise.

name: Toilet World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: A short horror game themed around Skibidi Toilet. Welcome to the party of toilet! Keep up with the familiar dynamic rhythm, explore this world filled with toilets!
